title: Shots fired in Jackson home, 5-year-old injured
content:
JACKSON, MS (Mississippi News Now) -
On Monday night, JPD was on the scene of a double shooting involving a child.
Someone shot into a home on Keele Street and a 5-year-old was shot in the arm and a 25-year-old shot in the leg.
Police say that both are in stable condition.
There are no suspects at this time.
We are working to gather more details.
